Method Detail

open

public void open()
          throws SourceIsClosedException
Description copied from class: AbstractPipe
Opens this pipe, i.e. all underlying sources will be openend if they have not been opened already.
Sets the flag isOpenend.

Specified by:
open in interface Source<O>
Overrides:
open in class AbstractPipe<I,O>
Throws:
SourceIsClosedException - If the source has already been closed.

processObject

public void processObject(I o,
                          int sourceID)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
Description copied from class: AbstractPipe
This method has to be overwritten to process each incoming element. The transfer method has to be called inside this method to transfer the processing results to all subscribed sinks. Consequently, its execution is considered to be atomar.

Specified by:
processObject in class AbstractPipe<I,O>
Parameters:
o - The element streaming in.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If the given element or ID is incorrect.

getObjectSize

public int getObjectSize()
Description copied from interface: MemoryManageable
Returns the estimated size of the objects which are stored in the memory of this memory monitorable object. This method can be called from the strategy of the memory manager to obtain useful information for distributing main memory among the memory using objects.

Specified by:
getObjectSize in interface MemoryManageable
Returns:
Returns the size of a single object (in bytes).

getPreferredMemSize

public int getPreferredMemSize()
Description copied from interface: MemoryManageable
Returns the amount of memory which is needed by this object for an acceptable performance. This method can be called from the strategy of the memory manager to obtain useful information for distributing main memory among the memory using objects.

Specified by:
getPreferredMemSize in interface MemoryManageable
Returns:
Returns the preferred amount of memory (in bytes).

Returns the assigned amount of memory (in bytes).
